setting_number_feed_display: <title>Number of RSS Providers displayed on homepage</title><info>Number of RSS Provider will be displayed on News HomePage</info>
setting_number_top_news: <title>Number of News displayed on Top News</title><info>Number of news will be displayed on "Top News" block.</info>
setting_number_recent_news: <title>Number of News displayed on Recent News</title><info>Number of news will be displayed on "Recent News" block.</info>
setting_number_featured_news: <title>Number of News displayed on Featured News</title><info>Number of news will be displayed on "Featured News" block.</info>
setting_number_commented_news: <title>Number of News displayed on Most Commented News</title><info>Number of News will be displayed on "Most Commented News" block.</info>
setting_number_favorite_news: <title>Number of News displayed on Favorite News</title><info>Number of news will be displayed on "Favorite News" block.</info>
setting_number_related_news: <title>Number of related news displayed on detail</title><info>Number of related news will be displayed on News Detail Page.</info>
setting_number_day_delete: <title>Number of Day To Delete News</title><info>Number of days for the system to automatically delete the news that are older than that period.</info>
setting_is_auto_delete: <title>Auto Delete News</title><info>Auto delete news that are older than a period of time.</info>
setting_is_display_popup: <title>View News Detail on Popup</title><info>Allow view news detail on Popup?</info>
setting_is_random_featured: <title>Add Random Featured News</title><info>Allow to add random featured news ?</info>
setting_is_image_downloaded: <title>Download The Images of News to Your Server</title><info>Allow to download news thumbnail to your server ?</info>
user_setting_auto_approve_posted_news: Auto approved news posted by these users?
user_setting_auto_approve_posted_rss_pro: Auto approved rss provider added by these users?
user_setting_can_post_comments_on_news_i: Can post comments on news items?

selected_news_items_were_deleted_success: Selected news items were deleted successfully
the_uploaded_image_file_size_must_be_gre: The uploaded image file size must be greater than zero
the_news_name_or_news_url_has_already_ex: The news name or news url had already existed
author: Author
title: Title
the_rss_provider_had_been_approved: The RSS provider had been approved.
the_rss_provider_had_been_declined: The Rss provider had been declined.
the_news_had_been_added_to_your_favorite: The news had been added to your favorite list
the_news_had_been_removed_from_your_favo: The news had been removed from your favorite list
full_name_commented_on_your_news_message: {full_name} commented on your news "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
full_name_commented_on_gender_news_messa: {full_name} commented on {gender} news "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}

unable_to_post_a_comment_on_this_item_du: Unable to post a comment on this item due to privacy settings.

user_added_a_new_comment_on_your_news: {user_name} added a new comment on your news.
user_name_added_a_new_comment_on_item_us: {user_name} added a new comment on {item_user_name}'s news.
posted_a_comment_on_gender_news_a_href_l: posted a comment on {gender} news {title}
posted_a_comment_on_user_name_s_news_a_h: posted a comment on {user_name}'s news "{title}"

the_news_url_is_not_valid: The news url is not valid.
you_must_have_a_least_one_rss_provider_b: You must have at least one rss provider before you can add a news.
some_latest_news_had_been_updated_on_the: Some latest news had been updated on the feed "{feed_name}"
setting_parse_news_directly: <title>Parse News Directly On Site</title><info>If set YES, the module will parse news using the parser integrated in the module. If not the module will parse news through YouNet news service server. (Recommend to set NO if your site is slow and cannot execute large resource).</info>
setting_parse_full_news_content: <title>Parse Full News Content</title><info>If set TRUE, the parser will get full news content.</info>
setting_display_full_news_content: <title>Display Full News Content</title><info>If set FALSE, the plugin will display the news description instead of it 's full content.</info>
get_news_content_0_to_display_whole_news: Get News Content (0 to display whole News, other numbers to display limited characters)
parse_rss_feed_to_get_full_content: Parse RSS Feed to get full content
setting_setting_subcategories_to_show_at:
<title>How many subcategories to show at first</title><info>This setting tells how many subcategories are to be shown at first. If the list of subcategories is longer than this value the extra ones will be hidden and a "View More" option will be shown instead, allowing the user to display the hidden subcategories. 

a "View Less" option will be available to provide the full "accordion" effect. 

If you set it to zero ("0" without quotes) it will hide every subcategory and a plus sign will show next to the category name, clicking the plus sign will show that category's subcategories.</info>
setting_is_using_advanced_category: <title>Using advanced category feature</title><info>When this setting is true, an advanced category system will be applied for your site. All old categories are kept intact. There will be changed in category layout; moreover, each user can have their own category.</info>
user_setting_approve_feed_before_display: Should feeds added by this user group be approved before they are displayed publicly?
user_setting_can_edit_approved_feed: Can an user edit his own feed after it is approved?
user_setting_can_delete_approved_feed: Can a user delete a feed after it is approved?
user_setting_can_add_rss_provider_in_pro: Can add RSS provider in profile?
the_number_of_delete_news_after_every_x_: The number of "Delete news after every (X) days" is invalid.
setting_foxfeedspro_meta_keywords: <title>Foxfeedspro Meta Keywords</title><info>Meta keywords that will be displayed on sections related to the Foxfeedspro module.</info>
setting_foxfeedsprofoxfeedspro_meta_desc: <title>Foxfeedspro Meta Description</title><info>Meta description added to pages related to the Foxfeedspro module.</info>
you_cannot_edit_item_of_other_user: You cannot edit item of other user.
the_uploaded_favicon_file_size_must_be_g: The uploaded favicon file size must be greater than zero.
